TASK: Change font size
DOMAIN: notepad

STEPS:
1. Open Notepad application
   REASONING: We need to launch Notepad to access its font settings
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.02, y=0.98)

2. Wait for Start menu to appear
   REASONING: Allow time for the Start menu to render before proceeding
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

3. Type "Notepad" in search
   REASONING: Search for Notepad application in the Start menu
   ACTION: TYPE("notepad")

4. Wait for search results
   REASONING: Allow time for search results to populate
   ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

5. Click on Notepad application
   REASONING: Launch Notepad from the search results
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.15, y=0.25)

6. Wait for Notepad to open
   REASONING: Allow time for Notepad window to fully load
   ACTION: WAIT(1.5)

7. Click on Format menu
   REASONING: The font size option is located within the Format menu
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.08, y=0.04)

8. Wait for Format menu to expand
   REASONING: Allow time for the dropdown menu to appear
   ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

9. Click on Font option
   REASONING: Access the Font dialog where font size can be changed
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.08, y=0.08)

10. Wait for Font dialog to open
    REASONING: Allow time for the Font dialog window to fully render
    ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

11. Click on the Size list
    REASONING: Select the font size field to change the current size
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.75, y=0.3)

12. Select a new font size (e.g., 14)
    REASONING: Choose a different size from the available options
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.75, y=0.35)

13. Click OK button to apply changes
    REASONING: Confirm and apply the new font size setting
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.7, y=0.85)

14. Wait for changes to apply
    REASONING: Allow Notepad to update with the new font size
    ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

15. Task completion
    REASONING: Font size has been successfully changed in Notepad
    ACTION: DONE()

EXPECTED_OUTCOME: The font size in Notepad should be changed to the selected size (e.g., 14pt), and any text typed in the editor will display in the new font size. The change will persist for the current Notepad session and affect all text in the document.
